message.content:
The likely categories for this product are:

1) Beauty: The product is a face paint, which falls under the category of beauty products.
2) Toys & Games: The product is mentioned to be used for face painting at parties and carnivals, which suggests it can be considered a toy or game for entertainment purposes.
3) Arts, Crafts & Sewing: The product is used for face painting, which is a form of art and falls under the arts and crafts category.
4) Office Products: The product can be used for professional face painting at events, which could be considered an office-related activity.
5) Health & Personal Care: Although not the most likely category, the product is used on the skin and is safe and gentle, which could be associated with personal care.

prompt:
Title: Mehron Liquid Face Paints - Green G (4.5 oz)
Content: Water based Mehron Liquid Face Paint can be used with an airbrush and is ideal for full body painting. It is also handy for face painting crowds of faces at parties, carnivals and other events. It can be applied with brushes, sponges or an airbrush. Made from quality FDA approved ingredients, Mehron Liquid Makeup does not include alcohol, so it's safe and gentle on skin. There is no water activation with liquid face paint so you can move quickly through your face paint designs. Mehron liquid pai...
